reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: VOLUNTARY CONTRIBUTION 2021- UNFPA/UNICEF “ELIMINATION OF FEMALE GENITAL MUTILATION: ACCELERATING CHANGE” (FASE III)

description.narrative: Contributo volontario all'UNFPA per il Programma congiunto multi-donatore UNFPA/UNICEF “Elimination of Female Mutilation/cutting: Accelerating change” (fase III). Mira ad accelerare gli sforzi verso la riduzione delle MGF, rispettando i diritti delle ragazze e delle donne realizzando la trasformazione delle norme sociali e di genere.

Voluntary contribution to UNFPA for the Joint multi-donor programme UNFPA/UNICEF “Elimination of Female Mutilation/cutting: Accelerating change” (phase III). It aims to accelerate efforts towards the reduction of FGM, fulfilling the rights of girls and women by realizing social and gender norms transformation.
